Reasearch Interests

  • Quantum Information and Computation

  • Online algorithms

  • Algorithms with applications to computer systems and resource allocation.


Discrete Math zyBook

I have written a zyBook (an interactive web-based textbook replacement) on Discrete Mathematics in collaboration with zyBooks.com. You can check it out here.
